tasks.label: verify:contracts
args:
set -euo pipefail
set -a; source deployments/base-sepolia.txt; set +a

# Verify TribeLeaderRegistry
forge verify-contract --chain 84532 --num-of-optimizations 200 --watch "$LEADER_REGISTRY" src/TribeLeaderRegistry.sol:TribeLeaderRegistry

# Verify TribeVaultFactory
forge verify-contract --chain 84532 --num-of-optimizations 200 --watch "$VAULT_FACTORY" src/TribeVaultFactory.sol:TribeVaultFactory

# Verify TribeLeaderTerminal
forge verify-contract --chain 84532 --num-of-optimizations 200 --watch "$LEADER_TERMINAL" src/TribeLeaderTerminal.sol:TribeLeaderTerminal

# Verify TribeLeaderboard
forge verify-contract --chain 84532 --num-of-optimizations 200 --watch "$LEADERBOARD" src/TribeLeaderboard.sol:TribeLeaderboard

# Verify TribePerformanceTracker
forge verify-contract --chain 84532 --num-of-optimizations 200 --watch "$PERFORMANCE_TRACKER" src/TribePerformanceTracker.sol:TribePerformanceTracker

# Verify TribeUniswapV3Adapter
forge verify-contract --chain 84532 --num-of-optimizations 200 --watch "$UNISWAP_V3_ADAPTER" src/TribeUniswapV3Adapter.sol:TribeUniswapV3Adapter
